# 8.0 Docs

## SDK and MSBuild

- [CLI console output uses UTF-8](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/compatibility/sdk/8.0/console-encoding.md): Learn about a breaking change in the .NET 8 SDK where the encoding for console input and output is now UTF-8.
- [Console encoding not UTF-8 after completion](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/compatibility/sdk/8.0/console-encoding-fix.md): Learn about a breaking change where the .NET 8 SDK no longer changes the console encoding after running a command.
- [Containers default to use the 'latest' tag](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/compatibility/sdk/8.0/default-image-tag.md): Learn about the breaking change in containers where .NET SDK-built containers default to use the 'latest' tag instead of '$(Version)'.
- ['dotnet pack' uses Release configuration](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/compatibility/sdk/8.0/dotnet-pack-config.md): Learn about a breaking change in the .NET 8 SDK where 'dotnet pack' uses the 'Release' configuration by default.
- ['dotnet publish' uses Release configuration](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/compatibility/sdk/8.0/dotnet-publish-config.md): Learn about a breaking change in the .NET 8 SDK where 'dotnet publish' uses the 'Release' configuration by default.
- ['dotnet restore' produces security vulnerability warnings](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/compatibility/sdk/8.0/dotnet-restore-audit.md): Learn about a breaking change in the .NET 8 SDK where 'dotnet restore' produces security vulnerability warnings by default.
- ['dotnet list package' warns if source doesn't provide vulnerability data](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/compatibility/sdk/8.0/dotnet-list-package-audit-source-warning.md): Learn about the breaking change in .NET 8 where 'dotnet list package --vulnerable' emits a warning when audit sources don't support VulnerabilityInfoResource.
- [Duplicate output for -getItem, -getProperty, and -getTargetResult](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/compatibility/sdk/8.0/getx-duplicate-output.md): Learn about a breaking change in the .NET 8 SDK where using property, item, and result-returning MSBuild flags in combination with a framework-specific build causes duplicate output of the requested properties, items, and results.
- [Implicit `using` for System.Net.Http no longer added](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/compatibility/sdk/8.0/implicit-global-using-netfx.md): Learn about a breaking change in the .NET 8 SDK where an implicit global using directive for System.Net.Http is no longer added to .NET Framework projects.
- [MSBuild custom derived build events deprecated](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/compatibility/sdk/8.0/custombuildeventargs.md): Learn about the breaking change in MSBuild where custom derived build events have been deprecated.
- [MSBuild respects DOTNET_CLI_UI_LANGUAGE](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/compatibility/sdk/8.0/msbuild-language.md): Learn about a breaking change in the .NET 8 SDK where MSBuild now respects the 'DOTNET_CLI_UI_LANGUAGE' environment variable.
- [Runtime-specific apps not self-contained](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/compatibility/sdk/8.0/runtimespecific-app-default.md): Learn about a breaking change in the .NET 8 SDK where apps that specify a runtime identifier are no longer self-contained by default.
- [--arch option doesn't imply self-contained](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/compatibility/sdk/8.0/arch-option.md): Learn about a breaking change in the .NET 8 SDK where the `--arch` option no longer implies that an app is self-contained.
- [SDK uses a smaller RID graph](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/compatibility/sdk/8.0/rid-graph.md): Learn about a breaking change in the .NET 8 SDK where the SDK uses a smaller, portable RID graph for projects that target .NET 8 or later.
- [Setting DebugSymbols to false disables PDB generation](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/compatibility/sdk/8.0/debugsymbols.md): Learn about the breaking change in the .NET SDK where setting DebugSymbols to false disables PDB generation.
- [Source Link included in the .NET SDK](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/compatibility/sdk/8.0/source-link.md): Learn about a breaking change in the .NET 8 SDK where Source Link is included, and commit information is included in InformationalVersion.
- [Trimming can't be used with .NET Standard or .NET Framework](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/compatibility/sdk/8.0/trimming-unsupported-targetframework.md): Learn about a breaking change in the .NET 8 SDK where trimming settings produce new warnings or errors in .NET Standard or .NET Framework projects.
- [Unlisted packages not installed by default](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/compatibility/sdk/8.0/unlisted-versions.md): Learn about a breaking change in the .NET 8 SDK where `dotnet tool install` no longer installs tools from unlisted versions of NuGet packages.
- [.user file imported in outer builds](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/compatibility/sdk/8.0/user-file.md): Learn about the breaking change in the .NET 8 SDK where the .user configuration file is now imported in outer builds.
- [Version requirements for .NET 8 SDK](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/compatibility/sdk/8.0/version-requirements.md): Learn about the breaking change in the .NET 8 SDK where specific versions of Visual Studio and MSBuild are required.
